## Fizz Buzz

```{r}

# we don't need this 'u' variable, it just makes it easier to change the length -MH
u = 100

results <- vector(mode = "character", length = u)

 for(i in 1:u) {
  x = i
  
    if (x %% (3 * 5) == 0){    # shortened from this:  if (x %% 3 == 0 & x %% 5 == 0){
      results[i] <- "fizz buzz"
      }else if (x %% 3 == 0){
      results[i] <- "fizz"
      }else if (x %% 5 == 0){
      results[i]  <- "buzz"
      }else{
      results[i]  <- i
    }

 }

results


```
